definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable id="item" type="MCItem">item</variable></variables><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="192" y="112"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="loot_table_foreach"><value name="location"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">oneiricconcept:entities/publiccc</field></block></value><value name="_placeholder"><block type="itemstack_iterator"/></value><statement name="foreach"><block type="itemstack_set_count"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_iterator"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="custom_dependency_number"><field name="NAME">nu</field></block></value><next><block type="spawn_gem"><field name="despawn">TRUE</field><value name="x"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="y"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><value name="z"><block type="math_dual_ops"><field name="OP">ADD</field><value name="A"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.5</field></block></value></block></value><value name="block"><block type="itemstack_iterator"/></value><value name="pickUpDelay"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
